Headline: Delays Affecting Loop-bound Brown Line Trains
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running with delays after an earlier mechanical problem on a train at Armitage. Crews working to restore normal service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running with delays after an earlier mechanical problem on a train at Armitage.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Crews are working to clear the congestion that's formed and restore normal travel times through the area.

Allow extra travel time.
